name.description: The name of the policy set definition. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

policy_type.description: The policy set type. Possible values are `BuiltIn` or `Custom`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

display_name.description: The display name of the policy set definition.

policy_definitions.description: The policy definitions for the policy set definition. This is a json object representing the bundled policy definitions.

description.description: The description of the policy set definition.

management_group_id.description: The ID of the Management Group where this policy should be defined. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

metadata.description: The metadata for the policy set definition. This is a json object representing additional metadata that should be stored with the policy definition.

parameters.description: Parameters for the policy set definition. This field is a json object that allows you to parameterize your policy definition.

id.description: The ID of the Policy Set Definition.

create.description: Used when creating the Policy Set Definition.

update.description: Used when updating the Policy Set Definition.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Policy Set Definition.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Policy Set Definition.
